sentence.Network_en: Also hideous but not uncomfortable furniture and an enormous mass of knickknacks.
sentence.Network_cn: 家具也很粗陋,但还不算不舒服,还有一大堆各式各样的小摆设.

sentence.Network_en: It'spent all their ss cash on foolish less knickknacks.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把钱全花在了那些傻不拉叽的小玩意儿上了.

sentence.Network_en: Given the Dutch predilectiona house full of knickknacks, I decided this was no bad thing.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我想到荷兰人喜好的屋中摆满各种各样的小玩艺, 我认为简陋一些倒并非是件坏事.

entry.def: Knick-knacks are small objects which people keep as ornaments or toys, rather than for a particular use.

example.ex: Her flat is spilling over with knick-knacks.
example.tran: 她的公寓里摆满了小摆设。
